sections.heading: meeting; questions; vote required
sections.text: All questions upon motions made at town meetings shall be determined by a majority of the electors voting, and the presiding officer shall ascertain and declare the result of the votes upon each question.SourceLaws 1895, c. 28, ยง 34, p. 142;R.S.1913, ยง 1020;C.S.1922
